name: Applane Solutions Pvt. Ltd
overview:
Applane for Business is cloud-based ERP suite that seamlessly integrates Customer Relationship Management (CRM), Human Capital Management (HCM), Project Management (PM) & Financial Management (FM) in one place. It is simple & intuitive to use and extremely cost effective while offering a stable & safe anytime, anywhere access to its users.

Applane for Business is a one-stop solution for your entire organization which is easy to customize, integrate and implement in a very affordable way. Applane helps organizations of all sizes across industries run better, without causing a flutter in their existing operations. Its innovative approach moves ahead from merely capturing of sales data to actually aiding the process of sales and customer relationship. Applane for Business packs a punch of features which instantly shows realizable benefits for your organization.

A few key applications within the suite are:

Customer relation management

Contacts Management(Import Directly from Google contact) Sales and Customer Relationships:- Campaign management Quote & Document Management Task Management (integrated with Google Calendar) Marketing Cost Management Twitter Integration and Send notification feature. Customer Support Management Won Opportunities Tracking

Human Resource Management:-

Attendance Management Payroll Management Training and development Self service portal Employee Tour Management System Activity/ Event Management

Operations Management:-

Order & Delivery management Project cost management Ageing reports Resource Allocation and Efficiency Management. Taskspace Management. Weekly Task Planning. Profit and Loss analysis

Finance Management:-

Sales and Purchase Order Management. Tax Calculations. Order Invoicing and Receipt Generation. Fund Transfer Analysis. Payments and Due Invoices Report Analysis. Credit and Debt Management . Asset Tracking and Cost Management. Loan and Expenses Management. Automatic Voucher Creation. Maintaining Ledger Entries. Profit & Loss, Balance Sheets and Cash Flow statements Reconciliation and management. Automated Bank and Cash Reconciliation. Vendor Management

Why Applane for Business?

Key Performance Management: Applane for Business helps you define Key Performance Indicators for your business functions. Every individual and managers have a KPI dashboard where they can visualize their own and their team’s KPI. Each KPI can be drilled down to last level of data to enable quick decision making.

Advanced Filtering and Sorting: Option to filter / sort report or form data in real time using advanced filters.

User Defined Fields: administrators can add fields on the fly and enhance the application as the processes change within the organization.

Interactive Reports: Applane for Business has a very rich set of reports. All reports are fully interactive and user can change filters and order drill down in real time.

Third Party integration: Applane for business can be integrated with any third party API using web services framework. Currently Applane is integrated with Google Mail, Google Calendar, Twitter and Linkedin. It can be integrated with any third party SMS and payment gateway to leverage existing facilities within the system.

Value for your money: We not only provide a great CRM solution, but have a great price too! How about 2 users entirely free? And no long term contracts; just pay as you go.

Key features of Applane CRM:

Contacts Management: Applane CRM imports contacts from various sources and keep them in an integrated manner to make them accessible easily. Sales & Customer Relationship: Applane CRM empowers you with more efficient and powerful sales enabling engine.

Email Campaigns: You can create email templates for new prospects, opportunities or customers and can communicate a message to a target audience with a single mail. ??

CRM API for Third-party Integration: Data in Applane CRM can be accessed and updated through web interface or a web service which means CRM be used in conjunction with your other business applications and data can be replicated both ways via connectors as required.

Customization: Applane CRM is highly customizable and can be customized to your specific business requirements.

Interactive Reports & Dashboards: Applane CRM helps you analyze sales & marketing trends and key CRM metrics by amazingly interactive reports and dashboards. Easy Access and Follow up: Applane CRM provides for easy follow up of your Leads, Opportunities and Quotes. You can access all information from a single screen and perform functions with minimal possible clicks.

Role-based Security: Applane CRM empowers you to control the CRM data access based on users’ job role in your organization hierarchy. Value for your money: We not only provide a great CRM solution, but have a great price too! How about 2 users entirely free? And no long term contracts; just pay as you go.
